column4: Hi all, ubuntu 9.10 Installation freezes after a while,my hard disk is raid having 2x500 Gb. please help
erUSUL:I will not able to answer that question. what I know is I have two hard disk 2 500gb hard drives i7 processor..
Er...have you checked the BIOS to see if RAID was being used - and if that's the case, have you then waited for the POST to display the RAID configuration and check that?
